blogPost.excerpt:
Welcome to Taste Buds, our brand new show featuring our very own Brad Leone. For the inaugural episode, he is joined by the Scarlet Witch herself, Elizabeth Olsen, star of the hit Disney+ show 'WandaVision.' So what is Taste Buds anyway? Simply put, we pair Brad Leone up with different guests to explore any and every food or food-adjacent topic under the sun. This week: cheese tasting. What better way to make friends?

Want Bon Appétit shirts, hats and more? https://shop.bonappetit.com/?utm_source=youtube&utm_brand=ba&utm_campaign=aud-dev&utm_medium=video&utm_content=merch-shop-promo

Still haven’t subscribed to Bon Appétit on YouTube? ►► http://bit.ly/1TLeyPn

Want more Bon Appétit in your life? Subscribe to the magazine! https://bit.ly/313UWRu

ABOUT BON APPÉTIT
Bon Appétit is a highly opinionated food brand that wants everyone to love cooking and eating as much as we do. We believe in seasonal produce, properly salted pasta water, and developing recipes that anyone can make at home. 


Elizabeth Olsen & Brad Try 10 Different Cheeses | Taste Buds | Bon Appétit
blogPost.body:
Welcome to Taste Buds, our brand new show featuring our very own Brad Leone. For the inaugural episode, he is joined by the Scarlet Witch herself, Elizabeth Olsen, star of the hit Disney+ show 'WandaVision.' So what is Taste Buds anyway? Simply put, we pair Brad Leone up with different guests to explore any and every food or food-adjacent topic under the sun. This week: cheese tasting. What better way to make friends?

Want Bon Appétit shirts, hats and more? https://shop.bonappetit.com/?utm_source=youtube&utm_brand=ba&utm_campaign=aud-dev&utm_medium=video&utm_content=merch-shop-promo

Still haven’t subscribed to Bon Appétit on YouTube? ►► http://bit.ly/1TLeyPn

Want more Bon Appétit in your life? Subscribe to the magazine! https://bit.ly/313UWRu

ABOUT BON APPÉTIT
Bon Appétit is a highly opinionated food brand that wants everyone to love cooking and eating as much as we do. We believe in seasonal produce, properly salted pasta water, and developing recipes that anyone can make at home. 


Elizabeth Olsen & Brad Try 10 Different Cheeses | Taste Buds | Bon Appétit
blogPost.title: Elizabeth Olsen & Brad Try 10 Different Cheeses | Taste Buds | Bon Appétit
blogPost.author: Bon Appétit

localize.title: 伊丽莎白-奥尔森和布拉德尝试10种不同的奶酪｜味蕾｜Bon Appétit
localize.description:
欢迎来到《味蕾》，我们的全新节目，由我们的布拉德-莱昂内主持。在首期节目中，他将和绯红女巫伊丽莎白-奥尔森一起出席，她是热门的Disney+节目 "WandaVision "的明星。那么 "味蕾 "到底是什么？简单来说，我们将布拉德-莱昂与不同的嘉宾配对，探讨太阳底下任何一个食物或与食物相关的话题。本周：奶酪品尝。还有什么更好的交友方式？

想要Bon Appétit的衬衫、帽子和更多的东西吗？https://shop.bonappetit.com/?utm_source=youtube&utm_brand=ba&utm_campaign=aud-dev&utm_medium=video&utm_content=merch-shop-promo。



还没有在YouTube上订阅Bon Appétit？►► http://bit.ly/1TLeyPn



想让您的生活中出现更多的Bon Appétit？订阅杂志吧！https://bit.ly/313UWRu



关于BON APPÉTIT

Bon Appétit是一个非常有主见的食品品牌，希望每个人都能像我们一样热爱烹饪和饮食。我们相信当季的农产品，适当的盐渍面水，以及开发任何人都可以在家制作的食谱。



伊丽莎白-奥尔森和布拉德尝试10种不同的奶酪｜味蕾｜Bon Appétit。

localize.title: 伊麗莎白-奧爾森和布拉德嘗試10種不同的奶酪｜味蕾｜Bon Appétit
localize.description:
歡迎來到《味蕾》，我們的全新節目，由我們的布拉德-萊昂內主持。在首期節目中，他將和緋紅女巫伊麗莎白-奧爾森一起出席，她是熱門的Disney+節目 "WandaVision "的明星。那麼 "味蕾 "到底是什麼？簡單來說，我們將布拉德-萊昂與不同的嘉賓配對，探討太陽底下任何一個食物或與食物相關的話題。本週：奶酪品嚐。還有什麼更好的交友方式？

想要Bon Appétit的襯衫、帽子和更多的東西嗎？https://shop.bonappetit.com/?utm_source=youtube&utm_brand=ba&utm_campaign=aud-dev&utm_medium=video&utm_content=merch-shop-promo。



還沒有在YouTube上訂閱Bon Appétit？►► http://bit.ly/1TLeyPn



想讓您的生活中出現更多的Bon Appétit？訂閱雜誌吧！https://bit.ly/313UWRu



關於BON APPÉTIT

Bon Appétit是一個非常有主見的食品品牌，希望每個人都能像我們一樣熱愛烹飪和飲食。我們相信當季的農產品，適當的鹽漬面水，以及開發任何人都可以在家制作的食譜。



伊麗莎白-奧爾森和布拉德嘗試10種不同的奶酪｜味蕾｜Bon Appétit。
